# Title: Request for Proposal - Translation Services
## Title in English: Translation Services
## Title in French: Services de traduction

### Description:
Public Works and Government Services Canada is issuing a Solicitation for Translation Services from English to French in the field of Ecology and Environment. This Request for Proposal is a call for qualified suppliers to provide translation services for a term of three (3) years with two (2) irrevocable option periods for a total volume of up to 10,625,000 words.

### Background:
This solicitation is made available to qualified suppliers through the Translation Bureau's directory of suppliers for translation services (Standing Offer EN966-140305). The following suppliers have been invited to submit a proposal:
- MEGALEXIS COMMUNICATIONS INC.
- NATIONS TRANSLATION GROUP LP
- SERVICES LINGUISTIQUES VERSACOM
- SOLUDOC INC.
- SYM COMMUNICATIONS INC.
- TCI TRANSLATORS, CONFERENCE
- UBIQUS OTTAWA INC.

### Key Services:
- Translation of up to 10,625,000 words from English to French in the field of Ecology and Environment
- Initial term of three (3) years with two (2) irrevocable option periods
- A comprehensive agreement will be awarded to a single supplier

### Deliverables:
- Final translation document in French
- Assurance that the translation adheres to the Official Languages Act and relevant regulations

### Selection Criteria:
- Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price

### Notice of Proposed Procurement:
This Request for Proposal has been issued through the Canadian Government's procurement system. The Qualifying criteria and submission requirements can be obtained from the Standing Offer EN966-140305 on the Government of Canada's Buy and Sell web portal or through the designated Contact.

### Additional Information:
- The Crown reserves the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.
- Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.
